item.title: Cisco WLC â€“ IOS Based WLC AP Count through SNMP (5760, 3850, 3650)
item.description: I had a hard time to find the correct OID and ended with doing a snmpwalk and try to find the right OID with a grepâ€¦ But i think i made it ðŸ™‚ Crosschecked on 2 5760 Clusters and i got the correct count on both, also tried to reboot some APs and the count seems correct to me. Note: I use 3.6.1 so maybe you get a different result with another software version.
